sx.blah.discord.util

Class MessageTokenizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • sx.blah.discord.util.MessageTokenizer

  • public class MessageTokenizer
extends Object
    A utility class to traverse through a message's contents and step through tokens like mentions, characters, words, etc. The tokenizer has an internal pointer of where it's at in the message. Everytime you call nextX, the internal pointer will move past the token it found. For example, if the string is this is a string of words, when nextWord() is first called, it will return this, and move to the first space. Calling nextChar() will return that space, and move to i, in is a..., and so forth.
    Author:
    chrislo27

      Returns the next character, stepping forward the tokenizer.
      MessageTokenizer.CustomEmojiToken nextEmoji()
      Returns the next custom emoji, stepping forward the tokenizer to the end of the emoji (exclusive).
      MessageTokenizer.Token nextLine()
      Returns the current text, up to the next newline/end, stepping forward the tokenizer to the next line.

      Returns the next mention, stepping forward the tokenizer to the end of the mention (exclusive).
